MarketingForm.name: MarketingForm
MarketingForm.description: Represents an Account Engagement marketing form that has been synched to Salesforce. Use forms on your website and landing pages to collect information about visitors and turn anonymous visitors into identified prospects.

CampaignId.description: The ID of the related campaign.

ErrorRate.description: The percentage of views that led to an error.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this form.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (see LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the marketing form.

SubmissionRate.description: The percentage of the views that led to a form submission.

TotalErrors.description: The total number of times a form error prevented a submission.

TotalSubmissions.description: The total number of times the form was successfully submitted.

TotalTrackedLinkClicks.description: The total number of link clicks from your thank you page.

TotalViews.description: The total number of times your form has been viewed. Includes multiple views from the same visitor.

Type.description: Specifies the type of marketing form record, either a form or form handler.

UniqueErrors.description: The number of errors generated by separate visitors.

UniqueSubmissions.description: The total number of unique submissions. Removes multiple submissions from the same prospect.

UniqueTrackedLinkClicks.description: The total number of unique link clicks from your thank you page. Removes multiple clicks from the same prospect.

UniqueViews.description: The number of form views by separate visitors.
